step.cmd: Download the dataset from the Pitney Bowes eStore using the link provided in the release announcement or welcome email. You can also download the dataset from the technical support web site, .
The dataset is downloaded as a zip file. Unzip the dataset before proceeding with the installation.
Copy the data to any directory. Note the file name and path.

info.note: You may install datasets on a mapped drive, but performance will be affected since you will be accessing them on a network rather than accessing them locally.

step.cmd: After you install the dataset files, follow the procedure on adding a database resource in the following section.
